tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Billing (
  billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  invoice_number VARCHAR(255),
  billing_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  claim_date DATE,
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  insurance_provider VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan VARCHAR(200),
  record_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
  bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  payment_status VARCHAR(20),
  bill_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_dob DATE,
    patient_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    patient_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE doctors (
    doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    doctor_specialty VARCHAR(50),
    doctor_phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    doctor_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 first_name VARCHAR(50),
 last_name VARCHAR(50),
 date_of_birth DATE,
 insurance_provider VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
 diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 diagnosis_name VARCHAR(100),
 diagnosis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE procedures (
 procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 procedure_name VARCHAR(100),
 procedure_date DATE,
 procedure_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE billing (
 bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
 bill_date DATE,
 total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE insurance_claims (
 claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 bill_id INT REFERENCES billing(bill_id),
 claim_date DATE,
 claimed_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
 claim_status VARCHAR(20)
)
